releaseNotes: Please update Simple Pro for bug fixes and improvements that include the following:
New: Added the ability to choose a font that Facebook is displayed in. Settings>Facebook>Font Style.
New: The FAB has been reduced to just post button to make it faster.
New: While on a photo page a new FAB button will appear to view images full size.
New: Simple error logs are now attached when sending a bug report.
New: Simple will no longer download a copy of a photo before sharing it.
